    • addDiscount

      public void addDiscount(float discountAmount, int discountType)
      Adds discount pricing off the specific CartItem object
      Parameters:
      discountAmount - The amount discounted (either .## for percent or a raw number for non percent discounts)
      discountType - The type of discount (0 is percent and 1 is cash)
